SEARCH
Package com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers.admin

Class AdminFilmManagementController

java.lang.Object
com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers.admin.AdminFilmManagementController
public class AdminFilmManagementController extends Object
Controller class for the Film Management window in the admin screen. This class is responsible for handling the user interactions and updating the UI for the page that allows an admin to edit information about an existing movie.
Author:
Agata (Agy) Olaussen (@agyCoding)

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminFilmManagementController

      public AdminFilmManagementController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()

    • setStage

      public void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      The stage for the Film Details window. This is used to set a listener to clear the selected film when the window is closed.

    • setSelectedFilm

      public void setSelectedFilm(Film film)
      This method is called when a film is clicked in the admin screen.
      Parameters:
      film - The film object that was clicked.

    • updateFilmDetails

      private void updateFilmDetails()
      Method to update the film details in the admin screen. It sets the text fields and ComboBoxes to the values of the selected film.

    • loadCategories

      private void loadCategories()
      Loads all categories possible to choose from (from the database) and populates ComboBox (with category objects). Display is steered by the Customer Cell factory. Updated attribute selectedCategory based on the choice made in the ComboBox.

    • loadRatings

      private void loadRatings()

    • loadLanguages

      private void loadLanguages()
      Loads all possible languages to choose from into the ComboBox and listens to the changes made by the staff member. Display is steered by the Custom Cell factory. Updates attribute selectedLanguage to the choice selected in the ComboBox.

    • loadSpecialFeatures

      private void loadSpecialFeatures()
      Loads the list of all possibile special features to choose from, into the ComboBox

    • loadCurrentSpecialFeatures

      private void loadCurrentSpecialFeatures()
      Loads current special features for the selected film into the LV

    • loadActors

      private void loadActors()
      Loads into the ComboBox all actors registered in the actor table in the database The staff member can then choose an actor from this CB to be added to the selected film

    • loadCurrentActors

      private void loadCurrentActors()
      Loads into the LV the set of current actors for the selected film

    • tryToUpdateFilm

      public void tryToUpdateFilm()
      Method to update the film, actors and inventory. Called when the staff member clicks on the "Update" button

    • updateFilmDetails

      public boolean updateFilmDetails(Film selectedFilm, Category category, List<Actor> actors)
      Method for updating the film details in the database, in a transaction.
      Parameters:
      selectedFilm -
      category -
      actors -
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • refreshFilmData

      private void refreshFilmData()
      Method for refreshing film data (querrying the database). Used after the staff member have updated film information (since the window doesn't close after update, it should show current information).

    • handleInventory

      private boolean handleInventory()
      Method for handling inventory changes. It validates user input first (if it's the correct format and above 0), then establishes if the user is trying to increase, decrease or not change the inventory and calls the correct method.
      Returns:
      true if successful (in either of the 3 options) and false otherwise

    • addInventory

      private boolean addInventory(int filmId, int storeId, int amount)
      Method for adding new inventory items. Always allowed, no constraints.
      Parameters:
      filmId -
      storeId -
      amount -
      Returns:
      true if the inventory was successfully added, false otherwise

    • reduceInventory

      private boolean reduceInventory(int filmId, int storeId, int amount)
      Method for reducing the amount of inventory items for the selected film. If the desired amount is not available, an alert will be shown. The method will check if the inventory items are currently rented out and not allow the reduction in that case. Staff gets feedback about the amount of successfully deleted inventory items (f. ex. if 2 out of desired 3 were deleted, the staff will be informed).
      Parameters:
      filmId -
      storeId -
      amount -
      Returns:
      true if the inventory was successfully reduced, false otherwise

    • tryToAddSF

      public void tryToAddSF()
      Method for adding a new special feature to the list of special features connected to the selected film. If the special feature is already in the list, an alert will be shown.

    • tryToAddActor

      public void tryToAddActor()
      Method for adding a new actor to the list of actors connected to the selected film. If the actor is already in the list, an alert will be shown.

    • updateDeleteActorsButtonVisibility

      private void updateDeleteActorsButtonVisibility()
      Method for updating the visibility of the button that allows the staff to delete selected actors from the selected film. If no actor is selected via checkboxes, the button should be invisible.

    • notifyActorSelected

      public void notifyActorSelected(Actor actor)
      Method for updating (adding to) the list of selected actors and the visibility of the delete button.
      Parameters:
      actor -

    • notifyActorDeselected

      public void notifyActorDeselected(Actor actor)
      Method for updating (removing from) the list of selected actors and the visibility of the delete button.
      Parameters:
      actor -

    • tryToDeleteSelectedActors

      public void tryToDeleteSelectedActors()
      Method for deleting the selected actors from the selected film.

    • updateDeleteSpecialFeaturesButtonVisibility

      private void updateDeleteSpecialFeaturesButtonVisibility()
      Method for updating the visibility of the button that allows the staff to delete selected special features from the selected film.

    • notifySpecialFeatureSelected

      public void notifySpecialFeatureSelected(String specialFeature)
      Method for updating (adding to) the list of selected special features and the visibility of the delete button.
      Parameters:
      specialFeature -

    • notifySpecialFeatureDeselected

      public void notifySpecialFeatureDeselected(String specialFeature)
      Method for updating (removing from) the list of selected special features and the visibility of the delete button.
      Parameters:
      specialFeature -

    • tryToDeleteSelectedSpecialFeatures

      public void tryToDeleteSelectedSpecialFeatures()
      Method for deleting the selected special features from the selected film.
